portfolio.title: Account Overview
portfolio.body: Account equity and daily performance score. Agents grade edge, execution, risk, and system health each day. Use period tabs to compare PnL.

equity_curve.title: Equity Over Time
equity_curve.body: Total account equity plotted over time. Hover any point to see the exact balance. Updates as fills are processed by the execution engine.

risk_pnl.title: Risk & Profit Summary
risk_pnl.body: PnL breakdown by strategy with current risk posture. Shows leverage, Value at Risk, drawdown, and daily loss budget usage.

positions.title: Open Exchange Positions
positions.body: All open positions on the exchange with live mark-to-market PnL. Click CLOSE to submit a market exit order. Synced every 5 seconds.

strategies.title: Strategy Lifecycle
strategies.body: Registered strategies with lifecycle stage, quality grade, and track record. Click PROMOTE to request advancement to the next stage.

activity.title: Event Timeline
activity.body: Chronological feed of signals, fills, governance decisions, and incidents. Use filter tabs to isolate event types.

model_scorecard.title: Model Performance
model_scorecard.body: Model lifecycle tracking and drift detection. Compares live metrics against baselines to catch strategy degradation early.

action_queue.title: Items Needing Attention
action_queue.body: Trade requests awaiting review, active incidents, and recent governance decisions. Approve, deny, or resolve items here.

pre_trade.title: Order Safety Gate
pre_trade.body: Safety checks that run before every order submission. Pass rates and throttle meters show health at the pre-trade gate.

risk_controls.title: Hard Limits & Breakers
risk_controls.body: Portfolio risk limits, circuit breakers, and governance policy status. Breakers trip automatically when thresholds are exceeded.

micro_edge.title: Trade Quality & Compliance
micro_edge.body: Risk-adjusted return analysis and compliance monitoring. R-multiples measure trade quality. Surveillance tracks open cases.

system.title: Infrastructure Health
system.body: Agent health and system status. Shows running agents, error counts, and last data feed timestamp.

daily_effectiveness.title: Daily Score
daily_effectiveness.body: Composite 0–10 score of today’s trading quality. Four dimensions: edge capture, execution timing, risk discipline, and system reliability.

portfolio_summary.title: Equity & Returns
portfolio_summary.body: Current account equity and period returns. PnL is calculated from filled trades. Open position count reflects exchange state.

risk_pnl_posture.title: PnL & Risk Posture
risk_pnl_posture.body: Strategy PnL waterfall shows per-strategy contribution. Posture grid tracks exposure, leverage, 1-day Value at Risk, and drawdown.

open_positions.title: Live Positions
open_positions.body: Positions synced from the exchange. Mark price and unrealised PnL update in real time. CLOSE sends a market order to exit.

model_registry.title: Registered Models
model_registry.body: All models with version and lifecycle stage. Stages progress from research through paper trading to full production.

drift_indicators.title: Strategy Drift
drift_indicators.body: Compares live strategy metrics against stored baselines. Deviation above 25% is flagged critical. Checked automatically by agents.

effectiveness_scorecard.title: Quality Dimensions
effectiveness_scorecard.body: Edge: win rate and profit factor. Execution: exit timing. Risk: drawdown control. Operations: system uptime and reliability.

exec_quality.title: Execution Metrics
exec_quality.body: Order execution stats from the quality tracker. Slippage in basis points, fill rate, and total order submission counts.

pending_approvals.title: Awaiting Review
pending_approvals.body: Trade intents requiring human approval. Escalation level (L1–L4) reflects impact severity. Approve or deny each request.

active_incidents.title: Open Incidents
active_incidents.body: Incidents detected by monitoring agents. Severity indicates urgency. Click RESOLVE when the underlying issue is addressed.

recent_decisions.title: Gate Decisions
recent_decisions.body: Last 10 governance gate outcomes. Shows whether each trade intent was allowed or blocked, the policy reason, and any size adjustment.

alerts.title: Alert Feed
alerts.body: Real-time alerts from incident detection and risk monitoring agents. Sorted by most recent. Severity badge indicates priority.

pre_trade_checks.title: Check Pass Rates
pre_trade_checks.body: Pass rate for each pre-trade safety check. Green means above 95%. Red means below 80%. Agents run these on every order intent.

message_throttles.title: Rate Limiters
message_throttles.body: Prevents excessive order submissions. Shows current message count versus the per-minute limit for each strategy and symbol.

risk_limits.title: Portfolio Limits
risk_limits.body: Hard risk limits from configuration: daily loss cap, max drawdown, and position size ceiling. Gauges show current usage percentage.

circuit_breakers.title: Automatic Halts
circuit_breakers.body: Trading halts triggered by threshold breaches. Shows breaker status, trip count, and cooldown remaining. Breakers auto-reset after cooldown.

governance_status.title: Policy & Approvals
governance_status.body: Policy engine and approval workflow status. Shadow mode logs violations without blocking trades. Shows active rule count.

r_distribution.title: R-Multiple Histogram
r_distribution.body: Trade outcomes measured in R-multiples (profit per unit of risk). Positive R means profit. Distribution shape reveals your edge.

edge_analysis.title: Win Rate Breakdown
edge_analysis.body: Win rate by strategy, symbol, and hour of day. Identifies where your edge is strongest and where it may be weakest.

surveillance.title: Compliance Cases
surveillance.body: Open compliance cases and recent investigation events. Cases are created when anomalies or policy violations are detected.

system_status.title: Agent Health
system_status.body: Health of all running agents. Shows total count, individual status, error counts, and last candle feed timestamp.
